name: es6-boiler
description: A minimal webpack boilerplate with es6 for the client and the server.

scripts.start: rm -rf dist && bin/webpack --config webpack.config.server.js && ./bin/concurrently "npm run server:webpack -s" "npm run server:watch -s"  "npm run client:webpack -s"
